about_the_game:
Wow! LORD DEBELLIA is trying to take over the world again, and it's up to some ragtag teenagers to stop her! Help DJ and his friends take on the roles of DEFENSE ENFORCERS, masked teenage heroes put into the spotlight to protect DAYLIGHT CITY! Can they protect the city not only from LORD DEBELLIA and her nefarious D-BEASTS, but also from scheming celebrities, manic TV personalities, good-turned-evil DEFENSE ENFORCERS, and w̴̵̴ h̴̵̷ e̶̵̵ r̴̸̵ e̶̵̶  ̴ ṭ̶̛ h̶̪̟̉̽ ë̸̡̛̲́͝y̴̡͎͕̩͎̿ ṵ̸ o⨠̸ y̴̷̶̵̵̴̷̶̶̥͓̗̾̈͛  ̴ ▇̷∜▇̷☷▇̷♴▇̷୴▆▇ ██■▓f̵̲̔́▓⅀l▓ ▓m̸̢̬͊̉̽́͆̿̕ℭ̴͈̻̕■̵̤͆̊▓℧̷͈͗̊▓▓℟̸̺̓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓

▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓

▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓

▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓▓

▓▓▓▓▓  ⋄ ⋄ ⋄

Only time will tell!

Use a wide variety of abilities!

Every Defense Enforcer comes equipped with their own weapon and two abilities. Mix and match what abilities you bring into battle based on enemy weaknesses or your preferred playstyle!

Swap between different heroes in the middle of battle!

Don't just use one Defense Enforcer in battle! Each Defense Enforcer has their own move set to use in battle! Swap among your teammates continuously to attack or swap at the right time strategically!

Break down your enemies and expose their weaknesses!

Enemies can have toughness and color-type weaknesses. Hitting enemies with attacks and abilities of the same color as their weakness will deplete their toughness. Depleting their toughness to zero will BREAK the enemy, causing them to be stunned and receive more damage for a few seconds!

Use this to defeat enemies faster and interrupt their plans!

Defend yourself against a changing grid!

The grid won't stay constant forever. Enemies can manipulate the dimensions and properties of the grid in their favor to unleash devastating attacks. Adapt well to make sure you don't get caught off-guard!

Replay exciting battles and challenge yourself in Arcade Mode!

In the middle of Chapter 1, you'll be able to unlock Arcade Mode! Arcade Mode allows you to replay fights you've experienced before in Story Mode, but with additional difficulty levels and attack patterns! Any abilities or items you've collected in any save file will also be available here!

Defeating enemies in Arcade Mode will also automatically grant rewards to all of your story save files. Your best clear times and grades are saved as well, so work towards getting the best record possible!

Explore the City!

Life isn't just about battling against the evil forces of LORD DEBELLIA. Explore DAYLIGHT CITY and see the wonder it has to offer in its townsfolk and environment. Grab food to eat, buy something for yourself, or help out people with things they should honestly do by themselves, but won't!

name: D-BEAT HEROES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: D-BEAT HEROES is a grid-based tag-team action RPG! Choose powerful abilities to take with you into combat and fight against your enemies on the grid! Protect Daylight City from the forces of evil and maintain order. Do it before it's too late!
